paint.fiji.trackmate

Class RunTrackMateOnExperiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.fiji.trackmate.TrackMateHeadless
      • paint.fiji.trackmate.RunTrackMateOnRecording
        • paint.fiji.trackmate.RunTrackMateOnExperiment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, org.scijava.command.Command, org.scijava.plugin.SciJavaPlugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RunTrackMateOnProject

    public class RunTrackMateOnExperiment
extends RunTrackMateOnRecording
    Provides functionality to execute the TrackMate analysis workflow for a single experiment. Each experiment typically contains one or more recordings that are processed sequentially.

    The workflow includes:

    • Initializing configuration and runtime settings.
    • Running TrackMate per recording in a monitored thread.
    • Recording runtime statistics and aggregating results.
    • Supporting user cancellation and timeouts via watchdog control.

    • Method Detail

      • runTrackMateOnExperiment

        public static boolean runTrackMateOnExperiment(Path experimentPath,
                                               Path imagesPath,
                                               ProjectDialog dialog)
        Runs the TrackMate workflow for a single experiment. Reads experiment configuration, processes each recording in sequence, and aggregates results into consolidated output files.
        Parameters:
        experimentPath - the directory of the experiment (contains CSV files)
        imagesPath - the directory containing corresponding image data
        dialog - optional ProjectDialog for user cancellation
        Returns:
        true if all recordings processed successfully; false if errors or cancellations occurred
